meanings.definition: The quality or state of being brown.
meanings.sent1: The brownness of the chocolate made it look delicious.
meanings.sent2: I love the brownness of the autumn leaves.
meanings.sent3: The brownness of the mud made it hard to distinguish from chocolate.
meanings.sent4: Her hair had a rich brownness that reminded me of a warm cup of coffee.
meanings.sent5: The brownness of the bear's fur blended perfectly with the tree bark.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a brown color.
meanings.sent1: The brownness of the wood gave the room a cozy feel.
meanings.sent2: The brownness of the dog's fur matched the color of the earth.
meanings.sent3: The brownness of the paint made the room feel like a giant chocolate bar.
meanings.sent4: The brownness of the old photograph added a nostalgic touch.
meanings.sent5: The brownness of the leather jacket made it stand out in the crowd.
